entity.name: TravelLens Maintainer
entity.description: TravelLens – Your AI-Powered Visual Travel Companion lets you point your phone camera at any landmark, sign, or menu and instantly detect objects, extract text, answer questions, summarize content, translate results, and play them back in under 5 seconds.

projects.name: TravelLens
projects.description: A Flutter + Dart mobile app integrating Hugging Face Inference API for object detection, OCR, QA, summarization, translation, and TTS—all in one seamless, sub-5-second experience.
